title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.106 - Renewal or amendment of specific licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.106 - Renewal or amendment of specific licenses

State Regulations

Any application by a licensee for the renewal or amendment of his license shall be considered as an application for a license and shall be filed in accordance with section
16.102
of this Part; and any such application for amendment shall set forth the reasons for such requested amendment. In considering any such application for renewal or amendment, the department will apply the requirements set forth in section
16.103
of this Part as appropriate corrective amendment of a license may be issued by the department at any time upon its initiative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
16.106

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
